import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import { updateClientinDB } from "../../../actions/clientAction"; export class profilclient extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.saveClient = this.saveClient.bind(this); } saveClient(event) { console.log(this.state); this.props.updateclient("5f3b975643782331124d4e1c", this.state); event.preventDefault(); } render() { return (
